title: MD
biography: Ileana D'Cruz is a Portuguese actress who primarily appears in Telugu and Hindi films. She is the recipient of several accolades including a Filmfare Award and a Filmfare Awards South.
aiSummary: Anil D’Cruz is a surgical oncology specialist with an H-index of 53 at Tata Memorial (Member). Has been published in JAMA Otolaryngology–Head & Neck Surgery. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
